programme.title: MR. ZOO: THE MISSING VIP
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to handle a case that has gone sideways.

programme.title: THE MAGICIAN
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: BEAR MAN
programme.desc: Two bears from the Institute of techonolgy have turned into humans after eating garlic and mugwort. Yet, one has grown up into a police, while one has become a gangster...

programme.title: THE NEGOTIATION
programme.desc: An arms dealer kidnapped two Koreans in Bangkok where the hostages were in fact held in an abandoned children's home in South Korea, when the kidnapper's motivations becomes clearer.

programme.title: RACE TO FREEDOM: UM BOK DONG
programme.desc: K-pop star Rain portrays Um Bok-dong, an unlikely hero in a government-organized bicycle race during the Japanese colonial era. Defeating Japanese rivals, his victories inspire locals and resistance fighters.

programme.title: BEHIND THE SHADOWS
programme.desc: Yun-ho, born weak and destined to die young, is drawn to his loyal friend, Jae-un. In the conservative Joseon Dynasty, Yun-ho disguises as a girl to confess his love to Jae-un before his arranged marriage.

programme.title: DEADMAN
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: INNOCENT WITNESS
programme.desc: A housekeeper is charged with murder. Her attorney is surprised to learn the only witness to the crime is a teenage girl with Asperger's. Will the girl be able to provide a valid statement?

programme.title: PENINSULA
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Catch the Ghost Ep3
programme.desc: Yoo Ryung, a zealous rookie detective meets Go Ji-suk, a station chief who avoids cases and seeks stability. He ends up cleaning up after the problems she causes and starts his life anew.

programme.title: Catch the Ghost Ep4
programme.desc: Yoo Ryung, a zealous rookie detective meets Go Ji-suk, a station chief who avoids cases and seeks stability. He ends up cleaning up after the problems she causes and starts his life anew.

programme.title: LOVE, LIES
programme.desc: A gisaeng is consumed by jealousy after her friend finds success as a pop singer and her lover falls for her. Feeling betrayed, things begin to fall apart as she tries to regain the things she lost.

programme.title: FIST & FURIOUS
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: MY WORST NEIGHBOR
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phil’s perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2

programme.title: Oceans Africa

programme.title: Oceans Africa

programme.title: Aging In The Wild

programme.title: Aging In The Wild

programme.title: Aging In The Wild

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phil’s perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure – climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing – real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Gran announces it’s time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she’s got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, D’Angelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: The dragon riders must sneak a very sick Magma Breather into the ICARIS infirmary.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold — along with Principal Krupp — blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months — everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When the adults exclude the kids from their adult-only cave, the kids make their own much cooler cave, soon making the adults want to switch caves.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When a freak lightning strike turns Thunk into a genius, Phil is thrilled to have someone likeminded on the farm, until the farm residents start asking Thunk for help with problems on the farm instead of him.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Tired of the farm's feud with the neighboring punch monkeys, Ugga arranges a punch summit where the Bettermans and Croods will stay in the punch monkey village to learn how to all get along.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: Universal Soldier
programme.desc: Two soldiers killed in Vietnam are revived years later as cyborg super-soldiers. But when memories return, they break free—setting up a brutal showdown between former comrades.

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, Viola Davis stars in an action-packed story of an elite all-female unit of warriors determined to defend their nation.

programme.title: The Man With The Iron Fists
programme.desc: RZA co-writes, directs, and stars in this genre-blending, hip-hop-infused kung fu film set in Hong Kong, featuring Russell Crowe, Lucy Liu, and produced by Quentin Tarantino.

programme.title: Back To The Future III
programme.desc: In Back to the Future Part III, Marty travels to 1885 to save Doc from an outlaw. Packed with laughs, action, and heart, it’s the epic Wild West finale to the beloved trilogy.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In Battleship, Earth battles a powerful alien force across sea, sky, and land. Directed by Peter Berg and starring Liam Neeson, Taylor Kitsch, and Rihanna, it's explosive action at sea.

programme.title: The Librarian: The Return To King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: Adventurer Flynn Carsen receives a secret map to King Solomon's Mines. When the map is stolen, Flynn sets out to find the map and the Key of Solomon's book, without which the map is useless anyway.

programme.title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw team up to stop a superhuman villain with a deadly bio-weapon in this explosive Fast & Furious spin-off starring Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham, Idris Elba, and more.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Chris joins his girlfriend Rose for a weekend at her family’s estate. At first, their warm welcome seems like awkwardness about their interracial relationship—until disturbing truths emerge.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: In Wanted, a slacker is recruited by a secret assassin fraternity, uncovering hidden powers and dark truths as he trains under elite killers, including Angelina Jolie and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: The World's End
programme.desc: In "The World's End", Simon Pegg and Nick Frost reunite for an epic pub crawl that turns into a fight for humanity’s future. Director Edgar Wright delivers a hilarious mix of nostalgia, comedy, and sci-fi thrills.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two Miami cops must switch identities to track down a heroin thief and save their department.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Before Snow White, two queens clash in The Huntsman: Winter’s War. Love, betrayal, and war unfold as Huntsman Eric battles evil to save a kingdom from Ravenna’s dark reign.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: Katniss Everdeen has returned home safe after winning the 74th Annual Hunger Games. She senses that a rebellion is simmering, but the Capitol is still very much in control as the next Hunger Games is prepared—a competition that could change Panem forever.

programme.desc: Joanna travels the length of India, showing us delights like the flower-sellers of Madurai, before taking us back to Uzbekistan for gory tales and gem making.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn 1
programme.desc: One of the several reinforced concrete highway overpasses constructed in the 1960s was Seoullo 7017. This deteriorating liability was transformed into an elevated green park by Dutch architects MVRDV.

programme.title: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Venice is under attack from climate change. Flooding is becoming more frequent. With each inundation of seawater, more salt impregnates the city's historic buildings. As it crystallises, it rips the bricks, mortar and stone to shreds. The city is crumbling. Venice's very existence is hanging in the balance. Can scientists and engineers find ways to protect this unique jewel of architecture, beauty and culture before it's too late?

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls 2

programme.desc: The 2025 MotoGP sees 22 of the world's best riders battle on 1000cc prototype machines, delivering over 250hp and reaching speeds of 360kph across 22 thrilling Grands Prix in 18 countries.

programme.title: 25/26 A-League Men Round 10
programme.desc: Top flight men's soccer returns in the ISUZU UTE A-League Men. Catch every moment on SPOTV NOW as 12 teams compete in the regular season with top 4 advancing to a single-game knockout.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is magically hurtled through space.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival; meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: Identical twins – a musician living in New York, and a mechanic living in Hong Kong – are separated in childhood but are unexpectedly reunited years later when the musician travels to Hong Kong for a concert.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: Made Of Honor
programme.desc: A guy in love with an engaged woman tries to win her over after she asks him to be her maid of honor.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: In Miami Vice, undercover detectives played by Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell navigate danger, crime, and seduction in a gritty, stylish update of the iconic TV series. Also stars Gong Li.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

programme.title: The Legend Of Zorro
programme.desc: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) - and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) - to take action.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Daniel moves to a new town where he is harassed by some boys who have mastered karate. He decides to learn it and when Mr Miyagi starts his training, he learns that there is more to the art form.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival; meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: The Karate Kid III
programme.desc: John Kreese, ostracised and penniless, tries to take revenge on Daniel and Miyagi with the assistance of a Vietnam War comrade who is the wealthy proprietor of a poisonous waste disposal business.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Paranormal enthusiasts Abby, Erin, Jillian and Patty set out to capture ghosts when they realise that someone is attempting to cause an apocalypse by summoning ghosts in the city of New York.

programme.title: Spy Kids: All The Time In The World
programme.desc: The action packed franchise is back…with the next generation of Spy Kids!

programme.title: Tin Man Part 1
programme.desc: A re-imagining of L. Frank Baum's classic "The Wizard of Oz."

programme.title: Mud Madness (S1)
programme.desc: “Mud King” and Bryce Sparks go head-to-head at the wildest party in the USA. But their grudge spirals out of control when one of them takes it too far.

programme.title: Mike Brewer: Born Dealer (S1)
programme.desc: Mike heads to Poland to avoid the dreaded British ‘Porsche Tax’. Plus, he turns a profit on an ugly duckling Peugeot and chases a sale at Santa Pod.

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters: Mine Sos (S1)
programme.desc: Paul Mackie and his team of experts travel to the unforgiving Western Australian Pilbara to help an Indigenous family gold mine save itself from financial disaster.

programme.title: Kindig Customs (S10)
programme.desc: Dave has a soft spot for all kids in need. So, when a car show in Oregon that benefits the local children's charity called, Dave eagerly said yes.

programme.title: Gold Rush (S15)
programme.desc: Rick confronts foreman Buzz, throwing down an ultimatum. Parker hopes for a big score on Sulphur Creek. Tony and Monica go on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain (S7)
programme.desc: At Barajas Airport, officers discover hidden compartments in two lamps. In Andalusia, the civil guard raids the homes of suspected drug traffickers.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain (S7)
programme.desc: In Andalusia, a random inspection exposes a driver with an outstanding arrest warrant. At the Port of Barcelona, a driver hasn’t declared his cargo.

programme.title: Border Control: Sweden (S2)
programme.desc: The security and customs services at the border of Sweden are on constant watch to stop illegal items from entering the country. It’s their job to detect crime.

programme.title: Real Time Crime (S1)
programme.desc: Surveillance cameras in Ohio capture a drive-by shooting in which a three-year-old boy dies. In Louisiana, a police officer’s son is shot dead in a nightclub.

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral (S4)
programme.desc: Looters wreak havoc in Philadelphia. A stubborn woman turns a ticket into a felony, and a suspect on the run picks a rather stinky hideout.

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral (S4)
programme.desc: A pizza delivery guy becomes an unlikely hero. Plus, police chase down an Amish buggy, and an armed elderly man reaches his breaking point.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown: Columbus Unearthed
programme.desc: Josh travels from the Dominican Republic to Spain in an attempt to solve the mystery of where the bones of Christopher Columbus are buried.

programme.title: Body Cam (S5)

programme.title: Cruel War
programme.desc: To combat the greenhouse effect, scientist Yan Xin attempts to plant newly developed super rubber seeds on a remote island, hoping to transform it into a thriving new land. Yan Xin's ex-husband decides to accompany her on this perilous journey. As conflicts arise, they encounter the local drug cartel, and a fatal battle is about to begin.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: RUTE:Toughness Redefined
programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation

programme.title: A Sealed Book

As adventurers race to claim its power, the palace gates open, unleashing an unseen terror and heralding a catastrophe beyond imagination.

programme.title: Iron Squad W

Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.desc: When money is involved, trust is a big word. Four Filipinas based in Japan will learn the hard truth about money and trust as they get entangled in their own schemes.

programme.title: Sid & Aya (Not A Love Story)
programme.desc: It follows Sid (Dingdong Dantes) who suffers from insomnia and meets Aya (Anne Curtis) who he hires to accompany him in his sleepless nights.

programme.title: Pag Oras Mo, Oras Mo Na
programme.desc: Action superstar, Phillip Salvador stars as a dedicated policeman who resorts to alcohol in this intense ,action packed movie.

programme.title: I America
programme.desc: "I America" is a dramedy about a complex half-Pinay, half-Caucasian lady looking for American living in Olongapo City who tries to get her passport and US visa in order to meet her father personally for the first time.

programme.title: Beauty and the Bestie
programme.desc: For an important case, a policeman needs the help of his former best friend to impersonate the daughter of a foreign dignitary in a beauty pageant.
A famous vlogger commits suicide after her content is based online. When she is about to kill herself, a man is quick enough to save her.

programme.title: Elevator
programme.desc: Trapped inside the elevator of a hotel casino complex, an elevator boy falls in love with his investor's girlfriend that forces him to choose between his love for her, or his dreams for a better future.

programme.title: Apat Dapat, Dapat Apat
programme.desc: Four women who swear to be friends forever, become domestic helpers when they go over to another country.

programme.title: Bukas May Umaga
programme.desc: Bukas May Umaga is a story of triumph in struggling for inner freedom and in search for justice of women violently victimized by raped.

programme.title: Dama De Noche
programme.desc: She has everything a woman could ask for but despite all that, there remains a craving in her, an itch that desperately wants to be scratched. So without her husband's knowledge, she leaves home everyday searching for men who can satisfy her insatiable appetite for the flesh.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: Seven years after his failed assassination and murder of his family, Ben (Cesar Montano) seeks revenge on Mando (Ricky Davao), master of drug syndicate and white slavery.

programme.title: Adarna Gang
programme.desc: Seeking justice, Adriana (Coleen Garcia) vows to take revenge on the family that killed her father - her target: the patriarch and his three sons Juan (JC Santos), Diego (Diego Loyzaga) and Pedro (Mark Anthony Fernandez).

programme.title: Bonanza S2 E18 - The Bride
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch in Virginia City, while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Mission Impossible S4 E08 - Mastermind
programme.desc: Smart, stylish and suspenseful, MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE returns for its dynamic 4th season, captivating audiences with its glimpse into the world of international espionage.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: When Anna offers a stranded mother and son shelter in a blizzard, she learns that they are the Royal Family of Galwick. Anna shows the Prince how they do Christmas in her hometown of Kentsbury. Stars Laura Osnes and Aaron Tveit.

programme.title: Roots: The Next Generations E03 - Turn Of The 20th Century (Part 1)
programme.desc: The dramatization of Alex Haley's family line from post Civil War America to the writer's search for his roots.

programme.title: CSI S5 E09 - Mea Culpa
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: The Nanny S1 E16 - Schlepped Away
programme.desc: Fran Fine turns up on the doorstep of Maxwell Sheffield and finds herself the nanny of Maxwell's three children: Maggie, Brighton, and Grace. Maxwell Sheffield is unhappy about it at first, but Fran turns out to be just what he and his family needed.

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: As the participants get past the shock of being dropped in the wild, the ability to think outside the box proves fruitful to some but a detriment to others.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: The dark origin stories behind some of history's most notorious methods of execution, from the guillotine to the electric chair.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2)
programme.desc: During World War II, the Nazis created specialised Death Camps for killing prisoners. At Sobibor, a group of Jews were forced to keep the camp operational, engineered a daring escape that saved many lives.

programme.title: Pieta 1
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Amanda (Charito Solis) and her unconditional love for her son Rigor (Ace Vergel). Rigor grows up not having to follow any rules and he does not cultivate a conscience. In his dealings with the underworld, he meets syndicate head Johnny Wilson. Will this pave the way for his all-out excursion to evil?

programme.title: Bilang Na Ang Araw Mo
programme.desc: Martin and Rafael were childhood friends who grew up on different sides of the law. Martin became a hired killer, while Rafael turned into a respected defense lawyer.

programme.title: Afuang: Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Abner Afuang is an honest to goodness cop who labors to keep the honor of his badge. Fighting ruthless criminals, he has acquired the fury of the syndicates he is fighting.

programme.title: SPO1 Don Juan (Da Dancing Policeman)
programme.desc: Leo Martinez is a policeman who directs traffic with choreographed dance movements. Unknown to him he has a look-alike who takes advantage of his popularity with motorists by directing traffic for get-away cars during robberies.

programme.title: Dapat Ka Bang Mahalin?
programme.desc: The story, which was based on a popular comic’s serial, closely resembled what would later happen in real life to local moviedom's favorite couple. Sharon and Gabby portrayed teenagers who eloped and got married against the advice of everybody.

programme.title: Wanted: Perfect Mother
programme.desc: A dashing widower named Dante (Christopher De Leon) is scouting for a tutor for his daughter, then a girl named Sam (Regine Velasquez) walks in and turned their once lonely home into a carnival.

programme.title: Ang Pagbabalik Ni Pedro Penduko (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pedro Penduko (Janno Gibbs) who was decreed by a hermit as the savior of the world, which was under an evil curse. To fulfill his destiny, he had to go back in time and fight with the malevolent pair from hell, Lucifero and Lucifera.

programme.title: Dear Diary
programme.desc: Two teen stories for one starring talented young actor Herbert Bautista. In one story, he was a houseboy who striked up a friendship with the girl. In the other story, he and his friends played detective.

programme.title: Sabado Nights
programme.desc: This is a tale of love and friendship among three young women, whose lives centered on what they do every Saturday night.

programme.title: The Maggie Dela Riva Story
programme.desc: Maggie Dela Riva was a popular young actress in 1969 when she was abducted and raped by four men from rich, influential families. Concerned about the rising number of crimes against women, Maggie came out of retirement to once more tell her story.

programme.title: Tropang Bulilit
programme.desc: Ric Rodrigo dies and he leaves his five children orphaned. The siblings miss each other so much they escape from their new homes and try their luck in Manila. As the kids go on one misadventure to another, their uncle, Lloyd Samartino is going out of his mind looking for them.

programme.title: Ang Babaeng Nawawala Sa Sarili
programme.desc: Dina Bonnevie plays Alvina, a young woman from a religious and conservative family, who was thought by everyone to be mad, but is in truth, being possessed by the devil.

programme.title: Lucas Abelardo
programme.desc: His sincerity and great dedication to his work is what distinguished police officer Lucas Abelardo from his other colleagues. But keeping to his principles while doing his job is not easy.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: Cases of Online Sexual Abuse and Exploitation of Children (OSAEC) are on the rise. We visit a Filipino NGO that protects victims, and helps them to recover.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Experience the fascinating sights of the airports and transport hubs which connect Japan with the world. Time-lapse photography will show you how these places bustle with activity around the clock.

programme.title: Ama Divers Restoring the Seabed
programme.desc: In 2024, natural disasters devastated the fishing grounds of the ama (free divers) in Wajima, Noto. We follow their efforts to survey the seabed and revive their tradition.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: At Hibuse Matsuri, the Fire Prevention Festival, men douse buildings in water as a prayer for protection from fire. At this event held in January, bonfires and sake help to keep people warm.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about the winter dates of Shokan and Daikan. The nuns teach us how to make seasonal rice porridge with seven herbs, kan-koji fermented rice and dried vegetables.

programme.title: Gunmachan (Ep. 4)
programme.desc: Join Gunmachan and friends for playful adventures full of laughter and curiosity, and explore the charm of Gunma Prefecture's traditions, culture, and specialties.

programme.title: 1/36: Foreign Residents in Japan
programme.desc: 1 in 36 people in Japan are foreign residents. As its population declines, we look at Japanese society in a new era of foreign workers, through an IT startup where 90% of staff are foreigners.

programme.title: Japan Railway Journal

programme.desc: It is Sports Day at Peppa’s playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the “tug of war”. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that it’s not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa’s car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dog’s garage isn’t far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppa’s car back to his garage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when it’s raining – but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now he’s more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when it’s not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision – but that doesn’t stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again and it bounces brilliantly on the short grass!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: During a walk, the Barbapapa family discovers a megalith. // Barbabright has a stroke of genius: the invention of the "BAM".

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbabelle proudly announces to her family that she wants to become a princess. // Barbabravo is moping with boredom, his brothers and sisters are all busy and no one wants to play with him.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: When the traveling veterinarian Dr. Diwa can't finish all her checkups in Builder Cove in time, Rubble & Crew know just what to do. // Lily's mermaid-themed birthday party is called off when it starts to rain. Time for a construction solution!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew steps in to help at Hotel Hadley after a snowy surprise. But when the stairs aren't fast enough, it's time to bow wow build! // Café Carl adopted kittens! But when they cause popcorn pandemonium, Rubble & Crew make the café cat-friendly

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: At a Christmas Eve sleepover the Jr. Patrollers are fooled into helping Mayor Humdinger steal everyone's stockings so he can get all the presents.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine. // When a carnival train gets stuck in a tunnel, it results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The Barbababies want to invent like Leonardo da Vinci. // The Barbababies must choose between going to the pool or going for a bike ride.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: If I were a billionaire, what would I do to achieve my dreams?

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tim tries to be at two parties at once. // Tim tries to find a bogweed free snack for Kai. // After losing again and again, Tia tries to win every party game.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build the perfect place to show off River's ever-changing photography projects... Builder Cove's own art museum! // Farmer Zoe has a new goat on her farm! But when she can't find the singing goat, the pups team up with Park Ranger Rose.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help their friend Catalina the Condor become an amazing Gaucha and save the Gaucho Games! // Dora and Boots meet Pilar the Princess Unicorn and help her get back to Unicorn Land!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Axle City's letters to Santa go undelivered, Blaze and Sparkle set out on an epic adventure to the North Pole to deliver them themselves! But can they make it to Santa before Christmas?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tim explores Rumbleton to find somewhere he can have fun alone. // Tim and Kai try to give Parky the best day ever. // When a storm keeps the Rexes at home they must think of a game to pass the time.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Charger helps the Paw Patrol rescue Santa and his helpers when a blizzard at the North Pole threatens Christmas. // Mayor Humdinger enlists Digi & Tal to help him win a hockey game, it's up to the pups to undo the mayhem the team causes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve and Rubble & Crew gets a call from Santa Claus... he needs help to build all of the toys in time for Christmas! But when Speed Meister overhears and tries to be the construction hero, Rubble and the pups have to save Christmas.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help their friend Catalina the Condor become an amazing Gaucha and save the Gaucho Games! // Dora and Boots meet Pilar the Princess Unicorn and help her get back to Unicorn Land!

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tim, Tommy, Tia and Dad get stuck on a remote asteroid.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tim, Tommy, Tia and Grandma go on the search for treasure. // It's the Roar Festival, and Tim wants to have the best Roar in town. // Tim, Tommy and Tia find a lost mammoth in their house.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: It's a snow day in Axle City, and Blaze and AJ are competing in the Super Snowman Contest! But when a giant snowball rolls them away, Blaze and AJ must brave the elements to make it back in time to win!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Roger's frozen food delivery truck gets stuck in a ditch. // Farmer Yumi's animals are stampeding towards town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave. // Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: It’s Adventure Bay Western Days, when a herd of cows escape from a train at the railway station!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: When Speed Meister builds his own station for reusing trash, the pups have to clean up the mess all over Builder Cove. // After a baby duckling follows them home, Rubble & Crew use their construction know-how to bring the duckling back to its home.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway needs a lot of pizzas, fast! But when Speed Meister steps in, the pups have to fix his pizza problem. // When a family can't get to the airport in time on Speed Meister's road, Rubble & Crew has to build a new road before takeoff.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora and Boots track down the Pirate Piggies' ship and save it from a kraken! // Dora and Boots help Bruno the Bunny find his own special dance moves in time to perform with his favorite band, the Bunny Boyz!

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora, Boots, and Vicky the Vicuña track down missing magic instruments to save Cloud Kingdom! // Dora rescues Boots' special banana puppet before the Golden Monkeys can get to it!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Park Ranger Rose asks Rubble & Crew to fix the bridge to Bear Island. But when Speed Meister intervenes, the pups have to clean up his mess and protect the bears from a rapidly approaching storm... with help from Auntie Crane's new Bark Yard Zoomer!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: A new Super Squirrely Whirly movie is playing at the drive-in theater! But when Speed Meister gets in the way, the pups spring into action to save the day. // It's Auntie Day! But can the pups finish building their present for Auntie Crane in time?

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a lost kitty from the bay, but who will save them from all the mayhem she causes? // Ryder, Rubble, and Rocky call in Chase to help them free Katie and Cali’s train from a rockslide!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The PAW Patrol must work quickly to fix the tracks and remove a train car at the Adventure Bay Train Station, before the next train comes. // Ryder and the PAW Patrol battle the clock to fix the lighthouse.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbabelle proudly announces to her family that she wants to become a princess. // Barbabravo is moping with boredom, his brothers and sisters are all busy and no one wants to play with him.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: On a trip to Paris, the Barbapapa family will discover the most incredible museum: the Louvre!

programme.title: The Observers
programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. Top international current affairs are covered by using eyewitness accounts from Observers- people who are at the heart of an event. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: Robocop 3
programme.desc: A multinational company is determined to evacuate the city of Detroit to build their pet project called Delta City. RoboCop must fight the mega corporation and help the people of Detroit.

programme.title: Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone and Estelle Getty star in this action comedy about a detective whose life is turned upside down when his feisty mother witnesses a murder and becomes his unlikely partner.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Benjamin Button, born in 1918 with the physical state of an elderly man, ages in reverse. He experiences love and break-ups, ecstasy and sorrow, and timelessness by the time he dies in 2003 as a baby.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Apollo 13 is an inspiring and riveting story of the real-life space flight that gripped a nation and changed the world.

programme.title: Robocop 3
programme.desc: A multinational company is determined to evacuate the city of Detroit to build their pet project called Delta City. RoboCop must fight the mega corporation and help the people of Detroit.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution, the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

programme.title: Megamind
programme.desc: Super villain Megamind’s (Will Ferrell) dreams have come true when he conquers Metro Man (Brad Pitt) but when a new villain (Jonah Hill) runs rampant, can Megamind save the day?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po (Jack Black) faces his biggest challenge since becoming the Dragon Warrior to lead The Furious Five on a mission of epic proportions and defeat his most threatening rival yet.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Have the time of your life with Meryl Streep and an all-star cast in this undeniably fun celebration of mothers and daughters, old friends and newly found family!

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: Detective Dee: The Ghosts in Weird Town
programme.desc: Detective Dee investigates a series of terrifying vampire transformations in Youming Town, uncovering a sinister conspiracy masterminded by Prince Li Zhen, who plots to overthrow the empire. Armed with courage and ingenuity, Dee defeats the bloodthirsty vampires and ultimately exposes the prince’s dark ambitions.

programme.title: Behave
programme.desc: Following the death of their friend, a group of young adults travels to a villa on the outskirts of London that contains a deep mystery. As unsettling events escalate during their luxurious stay, they must unravel the villa’s dark secrets.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Marjorie's husband, Irv, has recently been diagnosed with Parkinson's Disease and has already taken two dangerous falls in the house where the EMTs could not get to him.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: A brutal double murder shocks Northern California's peace-loving and laid-back Marin County. With residents reeling, police chase an elusive killer through three counties.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: A historic Texan town is stunned when a popular caretaker is found dead and a beloved resident goes missing. But with support from a concerned community, detectives uncover the secrets that led to murder.

programme.title: Lie Detector: Truth Or Deception
programme.desc: Years after Gary Coleman’s controversial and tragic death, his ex-wife agrees to take a polygraph test to confront lingering suspicions and silence the rumours that she was responsible for his death.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: 26-year-old Timothy 'Rambo' Ramsey is killed in a drive-by shooting, but the investigation yields little evidence, and the case goes cold for six years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A man in Modesto was apprehended by a K9 unit while fleeing from police; another was arrested while his family dog was bleeding in their backyard.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Lakhvir Singh enjoyed cooking for Lucky Cheema, the man she loved. But when he left her to marry a much younger woman, Singh made the couple a meal that would turn out to be the last Lucky ever tasted.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: When Lia was ten, she became intrigued by her mother's many collectibles and started going to antique stores and estate sales with her and is where Lia suspects her hoarding compulsion originates.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: November 23, 2014, Springfield, Oregon. A housekeeper at the Village Inn Motel calls police when she finds a guest unresponsive and cold to the touch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: When the body of free-spirited Bonnie Ruphard, 47, is spotted by a runner in Lafayette, LA, police suspect domestic violence.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: Detectives interrogate a woman accused of killing a lottery winner for his $30,000,000 prize; special agents press an ex-con about a missing 5-year-old girl and her dead babysitter; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A 92-year-old woman tells investigators why she shot and killed her 72-year-old son; a detective tells a suspect that the man he’s accused of stabbing has died at the hospital; and more.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Chef Philip Rolph was besotted with waitress Georgina Henshaw. But Phil realised she was using him for his money, and Georgina bragged to a friend that she was planning to kill him.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: When Toni meets Harold at a medical convention, they click and soon marry. But when money starts going missing from Toni's account, suspicion falls on Harold.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: During a road rage incident, Theodore Edgecomb shoots and kills immigration lawyer Jason Cleereman. Charging him with 1st-degree intentional homicide, the state contends it was a cold-blooded murder.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Residents of Robeson, Pennsylvania were stunned when Ashley Kline went missing on New Year's Eve. The 12-day search turned up several suspects until investigators uncovered suspicious text messages.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Before he hunted down his first victim in the wilds of Alaska, Robert Hansen was working at his father's bakery in a small town in Iowa, slowly developing an animosity towards women.

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Paname
programme.desc: Yvan Hallouin walks around Paris and its surroundings. In each stroll, the soul and identity of the 'City of Light' are examined through encounters with the local inhabitants and historical anecdotes.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: 100 % Pur Poils
programme.desc: This is one of Europe's most famous animal parks. The zoo at La Barben, near Aix-en-Provence, is a benchmark in species conservation and acts as a refuge for animals that have been seized or abandoned. Visit with Louis Pons and Adeline Godefroy.

programme.title: L'Épicerie
programme.desc: The place to be for all those who are interested in what they put on their plates and all things relating to food. The programme: reports, surveys, taste tests, test benches, answers to questions from television viewers, including advice and simple but effective tricks.

programme.title: Comment Ça Va Le Nord ?
programme.desc: With only four hours of sunshine per day, winter in the Far North is particularly harmful for the environment as fossil fuels, such as diesel or propane, continue to provide the main source of electricity. Finding new ways of doing things is becoming crucial...

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: L'Épicerie
programme.desc: The place to be for all those who are interested in what they put on their plates and all things relating to food. The programme: reports, surveys, taste tests, test benches, answers to questions from television viewers, including advice and simple but effective tricks.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: 100 % Pur Poils
programme.desc: This is one of Europe's most famous animal parks. The zoo at La Barben, near Aix-en-Provence, is a benchmark in species conservation and acts as a refuge for animals that have been seized or abandoned. Visit with Louis Pons and Adeline Godefroy.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S - Avant-Matchs
programme.desc: Presenting the next day of the French football championship.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yétili
programme.desc: Nina and Léon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yétili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yétili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Pétole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Roi Keïta
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keïta's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Roi Keïta
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keïta's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: La Fabuleuse Histoire Des Sciences Au Québec
programme.desc: When social science is no longer content to merely observe society but seeks to actively contribute to its evolution. Since the Quiet Revolution, activists and university researchers have worked hand in hand to question preconceived ideas, fight prejudice and encourage reflection.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Les Chefs !
programme.desc: The finalists cook their dream menus, inspired by the most significant moments of their lives. At the end of this ultimate challenge, the judges must decide...

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Les Trésors Des Ambassades Parisiennes
programme.desc: Embassies rank among the most beautiful residences in Paris. In these remarkable buildings, where diplomacy meets the history of France, hosting is elevated to an art form. A tour of these heritage gems, private mansions where all of Paris once gathered, often built or decorated by independent and wealthy women.

programme.title: Prodiges 2025
programme.desc: Singing, dancing, music: twelve young virtuosos aged 6 to 16 perform on stage and showcase their talent to the jury and the audience. The two best prodigies in each category will go to the final. They are accompanied by conductor Zahia Ziouani and the Divertimento orchestra.

programme.title: Lapin
programme.desc: Every Monday, a day off, Muriel Robin spends the evening at the home of Pierre Arditi. But tonight, for the first time, they realise that they are not alone, but much more... A play by Samuel Benchetrit, bringing Muriel Robin and Pierre Arditi together on stage for the first time.

programme.title: Ma Première Vente Des Vins À Beaune
programme.desc: When tradition, heritage and solidarity come together. Since 1859, the Hospices de Beaune wine sale has attracted thousands of visitors. The event helps to fund hospital projects and several charitable works. Dive into Burgundy's fascinating world of grand cru wines.

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: Allons-Y Franco !
programme.desc: Every Friday, journalists from the French-language media and TV5MONDE's partner channels share their views on current affairs.

programme.desc: The finalists cook their dream menus, inspired by the most significant moments of their lives. At the end of this ultimate challenge, the judges must decide...

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, Émilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Métiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Kenda
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: When Cecil's boss visits the house, the Stars get trapped in a sitcom. // When Squidina is bedridden, Patrick has to run his show without her.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Plankton must work together to survive an island of deadly monsters. // SpongeBob teaches Patrick how to ride a bike.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and his pals journey to the North Pole to give Santa a present.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Rube hosts an episode of "FUN-Believable! With Rube" where he explores little known oddities and attractions around Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max tell holiday stories to compete in the Thundermans Story Slam, but it's Chloe's story that makes them understand the meaning of the holiday.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When Mitch Bilsky enrolls at SWAG, Headmaster Ray and Danger Force use a combination of patience and powers to help him achieve the impossible and graduate high school.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When a video of Henry and Ray transforming into Kid Danger and Captain Man gets out, Henry must go to great lengths to get it back so that his secret identity isn't revealed.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raph's strength won't save him when he's caught between the Mechazoids and the notorious street gang known as Purple Dragons! Raph's going to have to use his head to get out of this one!

programme.desc: Mr. Krabs and Plankton are forced to spend time together when they accidentally book the same room on a cruise. // SpongeBob and Bubble Bass butt heads over which version of Quasar is better.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When one of Sandy's experiments goes awry, the Cheeks family team up to save Christmas in Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: DoodleBob bites SpongeBob, transforming him into a "WereDoodle". // SpongeBob dresses up for Gorilla Suit Day and is mistaken for a real gorilla.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: An imprisoned Plankton teams up with his fellow inmates to break out of jail and steal the Krabby Patty secret formula.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
